books.name: Percy Jackson And The Olympians 2: The Sea Of Monsters
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: It's not easy being a half-blood these days. Even a simple game of dodgeball becomes a death match against an ugly gang of cannibal giants - and that was only the beginning.

books.name: King Of Scars
books.author: Leigh Bardugo
books.description: The much-anticipated first book in a brand-new duology by New York Times bestselling author, Leigh Bardugo.

books.name: Bridge to Terabithia
books.author: Katherine Paterson
books.description: This Newbery Medal-winning novel by bestselling author Katherine Paterson is a modern classic of friendship and loss.

books.name: Lore
books.author: Alexandra Bracken
books.description: From the No.1 New York Times bestselling author of THE DARKEST MINDS comes a high-octane story of power, destiny and redemption.

comments.comment: It was so good that I read it again
comments.author: Ray

comments.comment: It's so good, you have to buy it, everyone
comments.author: Ethan

comments.comment: I read it very well and touchingly
comments.author: Mino
